means: （从一事物到另一事物的）渐变( gradation的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: But TV images require subtle gradations of light and shade.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是，电视影像要求有十分细微的光影变化。

sentence.Network_en: There are many gradations between good and bad.
sentence.Network_cn: 在好与坏之间还有许多不同的层次.

PerfectNetExp.abs: There are many gradations between good and bad ., 在好与坏之间还有许多不同的层次.
it is hard to understand all the minute gradations of their bureaucracy .很难弄清楚他们那套官僚体制全部细微的等级分别。
(GGBRS)粮食工作各级政府责任制gradations过渡层次graduated penalties and
By insensible gradations the last of the alchemists became the first of the experimental philosophers ., 经过极其缓慢的阶段性变化 , 最后一批炼金术士成了最早的实验哲学家.

list.abs: gradability 可分等级性gradation period 均夷相gradation zone 渐变带
lateral eruption 侧喷发lateral gradation 侧夷酌lateral inflow 侧面进水
sand fraction 砂粒粒组sand gradation 砂子粒度级配sand gravel 砂砾石
gradational type 过渡型gradational zone 序粒带grade estimation 质量评定

entry.def: Gradations are small differences or changes in things.

example.ex: But TV images require subtle gradations of light and shade.
example.tran: 但是，电视影像要求有十分细微的光影变化。

auth_sentence.content: Passing by insensible gradations into the next sense.
auth_sentence.res_content: Passing by insensible gradations into the next sense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Passing by insensible gradations into the next sense.

auth_sentence.content: There are no gradations of non-scientific-ness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are no gradations of non-scientific-ness.

auth_sentence.content: He's more interested than I have ever been in very subtle gradations.
auth_sentence.res_content: He's more interested than I have ever been in very subtle gradations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's more interested than I have ever been in very subtle gradations.
